pages.text: The $(mob)Matango$() is a humanoid monster that spawns in roofed forests on the surface in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is immune to poison and knockback and has a weakness to fire and axes. The $(mob)Matango$() will attack players on sight with a mix of melee and ranged attacks, and can apply a $(thing)Nausea$() effect to its target. In combat, it can spawn up to 5 $(mob)Sporelings$().
$(mob)Matango$() drop $(item)Iron Nuggets$() on death, which can be combined to make $(item)Iron Ingots$().

$(mob)Matango$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
